item.title: Small webclient error [317] following ric's tutorial
item.dc:creator: @charlemane charlemane
item.description:
@charlemane wrote:

Incase anybody sees this and is like WTF i had the same problem and nobody answered it… The answer is…

instead of
s =
s1 =

CHANGE TO::

String s =
String s1 =

IF THAT DOESN’T WORK, I DON’T KNOW WHAT TO TELL YOU. BECAUSE THAT SOLVED ALL MY 6 OF MY ERRORS
HOWEVER I STILL CAN’T GET THE WEBCLIENT TO WORK LOL

item.title: Small webclient error [317] following ric's tutorial
item.dc:creator: @TOKSICK TOKSICK
item.description:
@TOKSICK wrote:

Sanskrit:

“s” and “s1” aren’ t the correct variables for your specific client source.

this is the origanal without editing for the web client

    public static final String findcachedir()
    {
            try
            {
            	String s = ".file_store_32";
                String s1 = "./cache/";
                File file = new File(s1 + s);
                if(file.exists() || file.mkdir())
                    return s1 + s + "/";
            }
            catch(Exception _ex) { }

        return null;
    }

Read full topic

item.title: Small webclient error [317] following ric's tutorial
item.dc:creator: @TOKSICK TOKSICK
item.description:
@TOKSICK wrote:

i am stumped i was following ric;s webclient tutorial did it exacly as he did then get 6 errors in signlink.java
this is whats in my signlink.java

[code=java] public static final String findcachedir()
{
try
{
s = “C:/.deathx_file_store_32/”;
s1 = “”;
File file = new File(s1 + s);
if(file.exists() || file.mkdir())
return s1 + s + “/”;
}
catch(Exception _ex) { }

    return null;
}[/code]

this is the compile error

.\sign\signlink.java:239: cannot find symbol symbol : variable s location: class sign.signlink s = "C:/.deathx_file_store_32/"; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:240: cannot find symbol symbol : variable s1 location: class sign.signlink s1 = ""; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:241: cannot find symbol symbol : variable s1 location: class sign.signlink File file = new File(s1 + s); ^ .\sign\signlink.java:241: cannot find symbol symbol : variable s location: class sign.signlink File file = new File(s1 + s); ^ .\sign\signlink.java:243: cannot find symbol symbol : variable s1 location: class sign.signlink return s1 + s + "/"; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:243: cannot find symbol symbol : variable s location: class sign.signlink return s1 + s + "/"; ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 6 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
